basisSet.dc:title: d-aug-cc-pVDZ
basisSet.dct:abstract: VDZ2PD Valence Double Zeta + Polarization + Diffuse
basisSet.dc:description:
Doubly Augmented cc-pVDZ Basis ------------------------------ Elements Contraction References H - He: (6s,3p) -> [4s,3p] T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 90, 1007 (1989). D.E. Woon and T.H. Dunning, Jr., J. Chem. Phys. 100, 2975 (1994). B - Ne: (11s,6p,3d) -> [5s,4p,3d] T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 90, 1007 (1989).
The first shell of diffuse functions are from R.A. Kendall, T.H. Dunning, Jr. and R.J. Harrison, J. Chem Phys. 96, 6796 (1992). The second set are from D.E. Woon and T.H. Dunning, Jr., J. Chem. Phys. 100, 2975 (1994). The diffuse functions for Li, Be, Na and Mg are from D.E. Woon and T.H. Dunning, Jr. (to be published).
